name: Antenna Antics
description:
- A N T E N N A     A N T I C S -

*The official Ran-Out-Of-Time Readme!*

Antenna Antics is a game I made for Ludum Dare 49 in only 48 hours!

It's past 6AM now so I'll try and quickly write this readme for ya all hahaha

HOW TO RUN THE GAME

This game is a real NES game! Therefore, it must either be run on a real NES/Famicom, or on an emulator.

Fortunately, I have included MESEN, which is a pretty decent emulator :D

Just drag and drop "antenna.nes" into the MESEN app and you should be ready to go!

--- STORY ---

Oh dear! The Sunday Footy's threatened by an unstable TV signal! Only YOU can fix the neighbourhood's TVs!

Can you do it all before kick off?

--- CONTROLS ---

D-Pad: Move your character

A: Jump

B: Chuck Beer (Provided you have some)

START: Confirm choices

SELECT: Not used

--- TIPS ---

Don't hoard the beer! Sometimes tossing one at the right enemy will save you a few headaches

Very light tapping is key to get the right settings for the antennae!

Lasagna may be tasty, but the one in the game definitely isn't ;)

--- CREDITS ---

This game was made entirely by Antoine Fantys

Feel free to use this source code in your projects. However, don't use it for commercial purposes.
